mapper.insert: insert into wl_tech_reply (reply_no, board_no, replyer, replytext) values( wl_tech_reply_SEQ.nextval , #{boardNo},#{member.userId},#{replytext})
mapper.select: select replyer,m.img_profile, tr.reg_date,cnt_reply_like,replytext,tr.board_no,reply_no from wl_tech_reply tr, wl_member m where m.user_id =tr.replyer and board_no=#{value} order by reply_no asc
select writer from wl_tech_board where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update wl_tech_reply set replytext=#{replytext} where reply_no=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: select replyText from wl_tech_reply where reply_no=#{replyNo}
select count(-1) from wl_tech_reply_recommend where user_id=#{userId} and reply_no=#{replyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from wl_tech_reply_recommend where user_id=#{userId} and reply_no= #{replyNo}
mapper.update: update wl_tech_reply set cnt_reply_like=cnt_reply_like+1 where reply_no=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: select cnt_reply_like from wl_tech_reply where reply_no=#{replyNo}
